format: YAML/Makefile-like syntax (depends on build system assumptions)
description: Configuration include file defining tuning parameters and feature settings specific to the PowerPC e5500 architecture in a Yocto Project build environment. It specifies processor optimizations, compiler arguments, architecture features, and package architectures.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Utility function to check if a string contains a specific substring within the Yocto build system context.
